name: Montezuma Loops 2018
description:
The newest highly popular and addictive ball game (Zuma or Luxor Style) has come to the app store!


"Possibly the best Zuma-like game ever on iOS"
"Fun and I love it!"


Game Features:

1. Fully designed for iOS.

2. 54 exciting levels offering you an unforgettable gaming experience.

3. New Zuma gameplay: slide from side to side, or switch to another pad for smarter shots.

4. 6 powerful power-ups like Blast and Rainbow.

5. One touch game control, simple and intuitive.

6. Beautiful eye-catching and awesome Retina display graphics.

7. Appealing music and excellent sound.


More In The Future:

1. Many more levels will be released regularly in future updates.

2. Exciting and difficult challenge mode.

3. More powerful power-ups.


Last, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Montezuma Loops 2018! THANK YOU!
